name: Life Counter for Magic MTG
description:
Life Counter (Magic Edition) is a nice, clean and minimalistic companion app for card games. It is the only one that becomes part of your game!

You place it between both players and start over: Instead of managing your own damage, you deal it with a swipe against your opponent! And if you gain health you do a swipe in the direction of your shield.

A color coding system shows you the state of both players in the the glimpse of an eye. To define the first player you won't have to flip a coin: Just use the randomizer button instead! Furthermore sounds and little effects are integrated to support your favorite games scenery as well.

Graphics are designed by freepik.com
